FuncDef:
The time-range domain-block name command sets a time range for a domain.
The undo time-range domain-block command disables time range control for a domain or cancels a time range.
By default, time range control for a domain is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the time range used by a domain. The value must be a time range configured by the time-range command.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After time range control is enabled, the domain enters the blocked state in a certain period. In this case, the users in the domain cannot access, and the users who have accessed have to go offline.
You can set multiple time ranges in a domain.
